00069 /*
00070  * How Texts should work
00071  * --
00072  * A text should relate to a file as follows -
00073  * (Text *)->name should be the place where the
00074  *     file will or has been saved.
00075  *
00076  * (Text *)->flags has the following bits
00077  *     TXT_ISDIRTY - should always be set if the file in mem. differs from
00078  *                     the file on disk, or if there is no file on disk.
00079  *     TXT_ISMEM - should always be set if the Text has not been mapped to
00080  *                     a file, in which case (Text *)->name may be NULL or garbage.
00081  *     TXT_ISEXT - should always be set if the Text is not to be written into
00082  *                     the .blend
00083  *     TXT_ISSCRIPT - should be set if the user has designated the text
00084  *                     as a script. (NEW: this was unused, but now it is needed by
00085  *                     space handler script links (see header_view3d.c, for example)
00086  *
00087  * ->>> see also: /makesdna/DNA_text_types.h
00088  *
00089  * Display
00090  * --
00091  * The st->top determines at what line the top of the text is displayed.
00092  * If the user moves the cursor the st containing that cursor should
00093  * be popped ... other st's retain their own top location.
00094  *
00095  * Markers
00096  * --
00097  * The mrk->flags define the behavior and relationships between markers. The
00098  * upper two bytes are used to hold a group ID, the lower two are normal flags. If
00099  * TMARK_EDITALL is set the group ID defines which other markers should be edited.
00100  *
00101  * The mrk->clr field is used to visually group markers where the flags may not
00102  * match. A template system, for example, may allow editing of repeating tokens
00103  * (in one group) but include other marked positions (in another group) all in the
00104  * same template with the same color.
00105  *
00106  * Undo
00107  * --
00108  * Undo/Redo works by storing
00109  * events in a queue, and a pointer
00110  * to the current position in the
00111  * queue...
00112  *
00113  * Events are stored using an
00114  * arbitrary op-code system
00115  * to keep track of
00116  * a) the two cursors (normal and selected)
00117  * b) input (visible and control (ie backspace))
00118  *
00119  * input data is stored as its
00120  * ASCII value, the opcodes are
00121  * then selected to not conflict.
00122  *
00123  * opcodes with data in between are
00124  * written at the beginning and end
00125  * of the data to allow undo and redo
00126  * to simply check the code at the current
00127  * undo position
00128  *
00129  */
00130

00156 static void init_undo_text(Text *text)
00157 {
00158     text->undo_pos= -1;
00159     text->undo_len= TXT_INIT_UNDO;
00160     text->undo_buf= MEM_mallocN(text->undo_len, "undo buf");
00161 }

00163 void free_text(Text *text)
00164 {
00165     TextLine *tmp;
00166 
00167     for (tmp= text->lines.first; tmp; tmp= tmp->next) {
00168         MEM_freeN(tmp->line);
00169         if (tmp->format)
00170           MEM_freeN(tmp->format);
00171     }
00172     
00173     BLI_freelistN(&text->lines);
00174     BLI_freelistN(&text->markers);
00175 
00176     if (text->name) MEM_freeN(text->name);
00177     MEM_freeN(text->undo_buf);
00178 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00179     if (text->compiled) BPY_text_free_code(text);
00180 #endif
00181 }

00183 Text *add_empty_text(const char *name) 
00184 {
00185     Main *bmain= G.main;
00186     Text *ta;
00187     TextLine *tmp;
00188     
00189     ta= alloc_libblock(&bmain->text, ID_TXT, name);
00190     ta->id.us= 1;
00191     
00192     ta->name= NULL;
00193 
00194     init_undo_text(ta);
00195 
00196     ta->nlines=1;
00197     ta->flags= TXT_ISDIRTY | TXT_ISMEM;
00198     if ((U.flag & USER_TXT_TABSTOSPACES_DISABLE)==0)
00199         ta->flags |= TXT_TABSTOSPACES;
00200 
00201     ta->lines.first= ta->lines.last= NULL;
00202     ta->markers.first= ta->markers.last= NULL;
00203 
00204     tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00205     tmp->line= (char*) MEM_mallocN(1, "textline_string");
00206     tmp->format= NULL;
00207     
00208     tmp->line[0]=0;
00209     tmp->len= 0;
00210                 
00211     tmp->next= NULL;
00212     tmp->prev= NULL;
00213                 
00214     BLI_addhead(&ta->lines, tmp);
00215     
00216     ta->curl= ta->lines.first;
00217     ta->curc= 0;
00218     ta->sell= ta->lines.first;
00219     ta->selc= 0;
00220 
00221     return ta;
00222 }

00224 /* this function replaces extended ascii characters */
00225 /* to a valid utf-8 sequences */
00226 int txt_extended_ascii_as_utf8(char **str)
00227 {
00228     int bad_char, added= 0, i= 0;
00229     int length = strlen(*str);
00230 
00231     while ((*str)[i]) {
00232         if ((bad_char= BLI_utf8_invalid_byte(*str+i, length-i)) == -1)
00233             break;
00234 
00235         added++;
00236         i+= bad_char + 1;
00237     }
00238     
00239     if (added != 0) {
00240         char *newstr = MEM_mallocN(length+added+1, "text_line");
00241         int mi = 0;
00242         i= 0;
00243         
00244         while ((*str)[i]) {
00245             if ((bad_char= BLI_utf8_invalid_byte((*str)+i, length-i)) == -1) {
00246                 memcpy(newstr+mi, (*str)+i, length - i + 1);
00247                 break;
00248             }
00249             
00250             memcpy(newstr+mi, (*str)+i, bad_char);
00251 
00252             BLI_str_utf8_from_unicode((*str)[i+bad_char], newstr+mi+bad_char);
00253             i+= bad_char+1;
00254             mi+= bad_char+2;
00255         }
00256         newstr[length+added] = '\0';
00257         MEM_freeN(*str);
00258         *str = newstr;
00259     }
00260     
00261     return added;
00262 }

00264 // this function removes any control characters from
00265 // a textline and fixes invalid utf-8 sequences
00266 
00267 static void cleanup_textline(TextLine * tl)
00268 {
00269     int i;
00270 
00271     for (i = 0; i < tl->len; i++ ) {
00272         if (tl->line[i] < ' ' && tl->line[i] != '\t') {
00273             memmove(tl->line + i, tl->line + i + 1, tl->len - i);
00274             tl->len--;
00275             i--;
00276         }
00277     }
00278     tl->len+= txt_extended_ascii_as_utf8(&tl->line);
00279 }

00281 int reopen_text(Text *text)
00282 {
00283     FILE *fp;
00284     int i, llen, len;
00285     unsigned char *buffer;
00286     TextLine *tmp;
00287     char str[FILE_MAX];
00288     struct stat st;
00289 
00290     if (!text || !text->name) return 0;
00291     
00292     BLI_strncpy(str, text->name, FILE_MAX);
00293     BLI_path_abs(str, G.main->name);
00294     
00295     fp= BLI_fopen(str, "r");
00296     if (fp==NULL) return 0;
00297 
00298     /* free memory: */
00299 
00300     for (tmp= text->lines.first; tmp; tmp= tmp->next) {
00301         MEM_freeN(tmp->line);
00302         if (tmp->format) MEM_freeN(tmp->format);
00303     }
00304     
00305     BLI_freelistN(&text->lines);
00306 
00307     text->lines.first= text->lines.last= NULL;
00308     text->curl= text->sell= NULL;
00309 
00310     /* clear undo buffer */
00311     MEM_freeN(text->undo_buf);
00312     init_undo_text(text);
00313     
00314     fseek(fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
00315     len= ftell(fp);
00316     fseek(fp, 0L, SEEK_SET);    
00317 
00318     text->undo_pos= -1;
00319     
00320     buffer= MEM_mallocN(len, "text_buffer");
00321     // under windows fread can return less then len bytes because
00322     // of CR stripping
00323     len = fread(buffer, 1, len, fp);
00324 
00325     fclose(fp);
00326 
00327     stat(str, &st);
00328     text->mtime= st.st_mtime;
00329     
00330     text->nlines=0;
00331     llen=0;
00332     for (i=0; i<len; i++) {
00333         if (buffer[i]=='\n') {
00334             tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00335             tmp->line= (char*) MEM_mallocN(llen+1, "textline_string");
00336             tmp->format= NULL;
00337             
00338             if (llen) memcpy(tmp->line, &buffer[i-llen], llen);
00339             tmp->line[llen]=0;
00340             tmp->len= llen;
00341                 
00342             cleanup_textline(tmp);
00343 
00344             BLI_addtail(&text->lines, tmp);
00345             text->nlines++;
00346                 
00347             llen=0;
00348             continue;
00349         }
00350         llen++;
00351     }
00352 
00353     if (llen!=0 || text->nlines==0) {
00354         tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00355         tmp->line= (char*) MEM_mallocN(llen+1, "textline_string");
00356         tmp->format= NULL;
00357         
00358         if (llen) memcpy(tmp->line, &buffer[i-llen], llen);
00359 
00360         tmp->line[llen]=0;
00361         tmp->len= llen;
00362         
00363         cleanup_textline(tmp);
00364 
00365         BLI_addtail(&text->lines, tmp);
00366         text->nlines++;
00367     }
00368     
00369     text->curl= text->sell= text->lines.first;
00370     text->curc= text->selc= 0;
00371     
00372     MEM_freeN(buffer);  
00373     return 1;
00374 }
00375 
00376 Text *add_text(const char *file, const char *relpath) 
00377 {
00378     Main *bmain= G.main;
00379     FILE *fp;
00380     int i, llen, len;
00381     unsigned char *buffer;
00382     TextLine *tmp;
00383     Text *ta;
00384     char str[FILE_MAX];
00385     struct stat st;
00386 
00387     BLI_strncpy(str, file, FILE_MAX);
00388     if (relpath) /* can be NULL (bg mode) */
00389         BLI_path_abs(str, relpath);
00390     
00391     fp= BLI_fopen(str, "r");
00392     if (fp==NULL) return NULL;
00393     
00394     ta= alloc_libblock(&bmain->text, ID_TXT, BLI_path_basename(str));
00395     ta->id.us= 1;
00396 
00397     ta->lines.first= ta->lines.last= NULL;
00398     ta->markers.first= ta->markers.last= NULL;
00399     ta->curl= ta->sell= NULL;
00400 
00401     if ((U.flag & USER_TXT_TABSTOSPACES_DISABLE)==0)
00402         ta->flags= TXT_TABSTOSPACES;
00403 
00404     fseek(fp, 0L, SEEK_END);
00405     len= ftell(fp);
00406     fseek(fp, 0L, SEEK_SET);    
00407 
00408     ta->name= MEM_mallocN(strlen(file)+1, "text_name");
00409     strcpy(ta->name, file);
00410 
00411     init_undo_text(ta);
00412     
00413     buffer= MEM_mallocN(len, "text_buffer");
00414     // under windows fread can return less then len bytes because
00415     // of CR stripping
00416     len = fread(buffer, 1, len, fp);
00417 
00418     fclose(fp);
00419 
00420     stat(str, &st);
00421     ta->mtime= st.st_mtime;
00422     
00423     ta->nlines=0;
00424     llen=0;
00425     for (i=0; i<len; i++) {
00426         if (buffer[i]=='\n') {
00427             tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00428             tmp->line= (char*) MEM_mallocN(llen+1, "textline_string");
00429             tmp->format= NULL;
00430             
00431             if (llen) memcpy(tmp->line, &buffer[i-llen], llen);
00432             tmp->line[llen]=0;
00433             tmp->len= llen;
00434             
00435             cleanup_textline(tmp);
00436 
00437             BLI_addtail(&ta->lines, tmp);
00438             ta->nlines++;
00439                 
00440             llen=0;
00441             continue;
00442         }
00443         llen++;
00444     }
00445 
00446     /* create new line in cases:
00447      * - rest of line (if last line in file hasn't got \n terminator).
00448      *   in this case content of such line would be used to fill text line buffer
00449      * - file is empty. in this case new line is needed to start editing from.
00450      * - last characted in buffer is \n. in this case new line is needed to
00451      *   deal with newline at end of file. (see [#28087]) (sergey) */
00452     if (llen!=0 || ta->nlines==0 || buffer[len-1]=='\n') {
00453         tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00454         tmp->line= (char*) MEM_mallocN(llen+1, "textline_string");
00455         tmp->format= NULL;
00456         
00457         if (llen) memcpy(tmp->line, &buffer[i-llen], llen);
00458 
00459         tmp->line[llen]=0;
00460         tmp->len= llen;
00461         
00462         cleanup_textline(tmp);
00463 
00464         BLI_addtail(&ta->lines, tmp);
00465         ta->nlines++;
00466     }
00467     
00468     ta->curl= ta->sell= ta->lines.first;
00469     ta->curc= ta->selc= 0;
00470     
00471     MEM_freeN(buffer);  
00472 
00473     return ta;
00474 }
00475 
00476 Text *copy_text(Text *ta)
00477 {
00478     Text *tan;
00479     TextLine *line, *tmp;
00480     
00481     tan= copy_libblock(&ta->id);
00482     
00483     /* file name can be NULL */
00484     if (ta->name) {
00485         tan->name= MEM_mallocN(strlen(ta->name)+1, "text_name");
00486         strcpy(tan->name, ta->name);
00487     }
00488     else {
00489         tan->name= NULL;
00490     }
00491 
00492     tan->flags = ta->flags | TXT_ISDIRTY;
00493     
00494     tan->lines.first= tan->lines.last= NULL;
00495     tan->markers.first= tan->markers.last= NULL;
00496     tan->curl= tan->sell= NULL;
00497     
00498     tan->nlines= ta->nlines;
00499 
00500     line= ta->lines.first;  
00501     /* Walk down, reconstructing */
00502     while (line) {
00503         tmp= (TextLine*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00504         tmp->line= MEM_mallocN(line->len+1, "textline_string");
00505         tmp->format= NULL;
00506         
00507         strcpy(tmp->line, line->line);
00508 
00509         tmp->len= line->len;
00510         
00511         BLI_addtail(&tan->lines, tmp);
00512         
00513         line= line->next;
00514     }
00515 
00516     tan->curl= tan->sell= tan->lines.first;
00517     tan->curc= tan->selc= 0;
00518 
00519     init_undo_text(tan);
00520 
00521     return tan;
00522 }
00523 
00524 void unlink_text(Main *bmain, Text *text)
00525 {
00526     bScreen *scr;
00527     ScrArea *area;
00528     SpaceLink *sl;
00529     Object *ob;
00530     bController *cont;
00531     bConstraint *con;
00532     short update;
00533 
00534     for (ob=bmain->object.first; ob; ob=ob->id.next) {
00535         /* game controllers */
00536         for (cont=ob->controllers.first; cont; cont=cont->next) {
00537             if (cont->type==CONT_PYTHON) {
00538                 bPythonCont *pc;
00539                 
00540                 pc= cont->data;
00541                 if (pc->text==text) pc->text= NULL;
00542             }
00543         }
00544 
00545         /* pyconstraints */
00546         update = 0;
00547 
00548         if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE && ob->pose) {
00549             bPoseChannel *pchan;
00550             for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00551                 for (con = pchan->constraints.first; con; con=con->next) {
00552                     if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_PYTHON) {
00553                         bPythonConstraint *data = con->data;
00554                         if (data->text==text) data->text = NULL;
00555                         update = 1;
00556                         
00557                     }
00558                 }
00559             }
00560         }
00561 
00562         for (con = ob->constraints.first; con; con=con->next) {
00563             if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_PYTHON) {
00564                 bPythonConstraint *data = con->data;
00565                 if (data->text==text) data->text = NULL;
00566                 update = 1;
00567             }
00568         }
00569         
00570         if (update)
00571             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00572     }
00573 
00574     /* pynodes */
00575     // XXX nodeDynamicUnlinkText(&text->id);
00576     
00577     /* text space */
00578     for (scr= bmain->screen.first; scr; scr= scr->id.next) {
00579         for (area= scr->areabase.first; area; area= area->next) {
00580             for (sl= area->spacedata.first; sl; sl= sl->next) {
00581                 if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_TEXT) {
00582                     SpaceText *st= (SpaceText*) sl;
00583                     
00584                     if (st->text==text) {
00585                         st->text= NULL;
00586                         st->top= 0;
00587                     }
00588                 }
00589             }
00590         }
00591     }
00592 
00593     text->id.us= 0;
00594 }
00595 
00596 void clear_text(Text *text) /* called directly from rna */
00597 {
00598     int oldstate;
00599 
00600     oldstate = txt_get_undostate(  );
00601     txt_set_undostate( 1 );
00602     txt_sel_all( text );
00603     txt_delete_sel(text);
00604     txt_set_undostate(oldstate);
00605 
00606     txt_make_dirty(text);
00607 }
00608 
00609 void write_text(Text *text, const char *str) /* called directly from rna */
00610 {
00611     int oldstate;
00612 
00613     oldstate = txt_get_undostate();
00614     txt_insert_buf(text, str);
00615     txt_move_eof(text, 0);
00616     txt_set_undostate(oldstate);
00617 
00618     txt_make_dirty(text);
00619 }

00625 static void make_new_line(TextLine *line, char *newline)
00626 {
00627     if (line->line) MEM_freeN(line->line);
00628     if (line->format) MEM_freeN(line->format);
00629     
00630     line->line= newline;
00631     line->len= strlen(newline);
00632     line->format= NULL;
00633 }
00634 
00635 static TextLine *txt_new_line(const char *str)
00636 {
00637     TextLine *tmp;
00638 
00639     if (!str) str= "";
00640     
00641     tmp= (TextLine *) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00642     tmp->line= MEM_mallocN(strlen(str)+1, "textline_string");
00643     tmp->format= NULL;
00644     
00645     strcpy(tmp->line, str);
00646     
00647     tmp->len= strlen(str);
00648     tmp->next= tmp->prev= NULL;
00649     
00650     return tmp;
00651 }
00652 
00653 static TextLine *txt_new_linen(const char *str, int n)
00654 {
00655     TextLine *tmp;
00656 
00657     tmp= (TextLine *) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
00658     tmp->line= MEM_mallocN(n+1, "textline_string");
00659     tmp->format= NULL;
00660     
00661     BLI_strncpy(tmp->line, (str)? str: "", n+1);
00662     
00663     tmp->len= strlen(tmp->line);
00664     tmp->next= tmp->prev= NULL;
00665     
00666     return tmp;
00667 }
00668 
00669 void txt_clean_text (Text *text) 
00670 {   
00671     TextLine **top, **bot;
00672     
00673     if (!text) return;
00674     
00675     if (!text->lines.first) {
00676         if (text->lines.last) text->lines.first= text->lines.last;
00677         else text->lines.first= text->lines.last= txt_new_line(NULL);
00678     } 
00679     
00680     if (!text->lines.last) text->lines.last= text->lines.first;
00681 
00682     top= (TextLine **) &text->lines.first;
00683     bot= (TextLine **) &text->lines.last;
00684     
00685     while ((*top)->prev) *top= (*top)->prev;
00686     while ((*bot)->next) *bot= (*bot)->next;
00687 
00688     if (!text->curl) {
00689         if (text->sell) text->curl= text->sell;
00690         else text->curl= text->lines.first;
00691         text->curc= 0;
00692     }
00693 
00694     if (!text->sell) {
00695         text->sell= text->curl;
00696         text->selc= 0;
00697     }
00698 }
00699 
00700 int txt_get_span (TextLine *from, TextLine *to)
00701 {
00702     int ret=0;
00703     TextLine *tmp= from;
00704 
00705     if (!to || !from) return 0;
00706     if (from==to) return 0;
00707 
00708     /* Look forwards */
00709     while (tmp) {
00710         if (tmp == to) return ret;
00711         ret++;
00712         tmp= tmp->next;
00713     }
00714 
00715     /* Look backwards */
00716     if (!tmp) {
00717         tmp= from;
00718         ret=0;
00719         while (tmp) {
00720             if (tmp == to) break;
00721             ret--;
00722             tmp= tmp->prev;
00723         }
00724         if (!tmp) ret=0;
00725     }
00726 
00727     return ret; 
00728 }
00729 
00730 static void txt_make_dirty (Text *text)
00731 {
00732     text->flags |= TXT_ISDIRTY;
00733 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00734     if (text->compiled) BPY_text_free_code(text);
00735 #endif
00736 }
00737 
00738 /****************************/
00739 /* Cursor utility functions */
00740 /****************************/
00741 
00742 static void txt_curs_cur (Text *text, TextLine ***linep, int **charp)
00743 {
00744     *linep= &text->curl; *charp= &text->curc;
00745 }
00746 
00747 static void txt_curs_sel (Text *text, TextLine ***linep, int **charp)
00748 {
00749     *linep= &text->sell; *charp= &text->selc;
00750 }
00751 
00752 static void txt_curs_first (Text *text, TextLine **linep, int *charp)
00753 {
00754     if (text->curl==text->sell) {
00755         *linep= text->curl;
00756         if (text->curc<text->selc) *charp= text->curc;
00757         else *charp= text->selc;
00758     }
00759     else if (txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl)<txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell)) {
00760         *linep= text->curl;
00761         *charp= text->curc;
00762     }
00763     else {
00764         *linep= text->sell;
00765         *charp= text->selc;     
00766     }
00767 }
00768 
00769 /*****************************/
00770 /* Cursor movement functions */
00771 /*****************************/
00772 
00773 int txt_utf8_offset_to_index(const char *str, int offset)
00774 {
00775     int index= 0, pos= 0;
00776     while (pos != offset) {
00777         pos += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + pos);
00778         index++;
00779     }
00780     return index;
00781 }
00782 
00783 int txt_utf8_index_to_offset(const char *str, int index)
00784 {
00785     int offset= 0, pos= 0;
00786     while (pos != index) {
00787         offset += BLI_str_utf8_size(str + offset);
00788         pos++;
00789     }
00790     return offset;
00791 }
00792 
00793 /* returns the real number of characters in string */
00794 /* not the same as BLI_strlen_utf8, which returns length for wide characters */
00795 static int txt_utf8_len(const char *src)
00796 {
00797     int len;
00798 
00799     for (len=0; *src; len++) {
00800         src += BLI_str_utf8_size(src);
00801     }
00802 
00803     return len;
00804 }
00805 
00806 void txt_move_up(Text *text, short sel)
00807 {
00808     TextLine **linep;
00809     int *charp;
00810     /* int old; */ /* UNUSED */
00811     
00812     if (!text) return;
00813     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
00814     else { txt_pop_first(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
00815     if (!*linep) return;
00816     /* old= *charp; */ /* UNUSED */
00817 
00818     if ((*linep)->prev) {
00819         int index = txt_utf8_offset_to_index((*linep)->line, *charp);
00820         *linep= (*linep)->prev;
00821         if (index > txt_utf8_len((*linep)->line)) *charp= (*linep)->len;
00822         else *charp= txt_utf8_index_to_offset((*linep)->line, index);
00823         
00824         if (!undoing)
00825             txt_undo_add_op(text, sel?UNDO_SUP:UNDO_CUP);
00826     }
00827     else {
00828         txt_move_bol(text, sel);
00829     }
00830 
00831     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
00832 }
00833 
00834 void txt_move_down(Text *text, short sel) 
00835 {
00836     TextLine **linep;
00837     int *charp;
00838     /* int old; */ /* UNUSED */
00839     
00840     if (!text) return;
00841     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
00842     else { txt_pop_last(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
00843     if (!*linep) return;
00844     /* old= *charp; */ /* UNUSED */
00845 
00846     if ((*linep)->next) {
00847         int index = txt_utf8_offset_to_index((*linep)->line, *charp);
00848         *linep= (*linep)->next;
00849         if (index > txt_utf8_len((*linep)->line)) *charp= (*linep)->len;
00850         else *charp= txt_utf8_index_to_offset((*linep)->line, index);
00851         
00852         if (!undoing)
00853             txt_undo_add_op(text, sel?UNDO_SDOWN:UNDO_CDOWN);
00854     }
00855     else {
00856         txt_move_eol(text, sel);
00857     }
00858 
00859     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
00860 }
00861 
00862 void txt_move_left(Text *text, short sel) 
00863 {
00864     TextLine **linep;
00865     int *charp, oundoing= undoing;
00866     int tabsize= 0, i= 0;
00867     
00868     if (!text) return;
00869     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
00870     else { txt_pop_first(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
00871     if (!*linep) return;
00872 
00873     undoing= 1;
00874 
00875     if (*charp== 0) {
00876         if ((*linep)->prev) {
00877             txt_move_up(text, sel);
00878             *charp= (*linep)->len;
00879         }
00880     }
00881     else {
00882         // do nice left only if there are only spaces
00883         // TXT_TABSIZE hardcoded in DNA_text_types.h
00884         if (text->flags & TXT_TABSTOSPACES) {
00885             tabsize= (*charp < TXT_TABSIZE) ? *charp : TXT_TABSIZE;
00886             
00887             for (i=0; i<(*charp); i++)
00888                 if ((*linep)->line[i] != ' ') {
00889                     tabsize= 0;
00890                     break;
00891                 }
00892             
00893             // if in the middle of the space-tab
00894             if (tabsize && (*charp) % TXT_TABSIZE != 0)
00895                 tabsize= ((*charp) % TXT_TABSIZE);
00896         }
00897         
00898         if (tabsize)
00899             (*charp)-= tabsize;
00900         else {
00901             const char *prev= BLI_str_prev_char_utf8((*linep)->line + *charp);
00902             *charp= prev - (*linep)->line;
00903         }
00904     }
00905 
00906     undoing= oundoing;
00907     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_op(text, sel?UNDO_SLEFT:UNDO_CLEFT);
00908     
00909     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
00910 }
00911 
00912 void txt_move_right(Text *text, short sel) 
00913 {
00914     TextLine **linep;
00915     int *charp, oundoing= undoing, do_tab= 0, i;
00916     
00917     if (!text) return;
00918     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
00919     else { txt_pop_last(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
00920     if (!*linep) return;
00921 
00922     undoing= 1;
00923 
00924     if (*charp== (*linep)->len) {
00925         if ((*linep)->next) {
00926             txt_move_down(text, sel);
00927             *charp= 0;
00928         }
00929     } 
00930     else {
00931         // do nice right only if there are only spaces
00932         // spaces hardcoded in DNA_text_types.h
00933         if (text->flags & TXT_TABSTOSPACES && (*linep)->line[*charp]== ' ') {
00934             do_tab= 1;
00935             for (i=0; i<*charp; i++)
00936                 if ((*linep)->line[i]!= ' ') {
00937                     do_tab= 0;
00938                     break;
00939                 }
00940         }
00941         
00942         if (do_tab) {
00943             int tabsize= (*charp) % TXT_TABSIZE + 1;
00944             for (i=*charp+1; (*linep)->line[i]==' ' && tabsize<TXT_TABSIZE; i++)
00945                 tabsize++;
00946             (*charp)= i;
00947         }
00948         else (*charp)+= BLI_str_utf8_size((*linep)->line + *charp);
00949     }
00950     
00951     undoing= oundoing;
00952     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_op(text, sel?UNDO_SRIGHT:UNDO_CRIGHT);
00953 
00954     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
00955 }
00956 
00957 void txt_jump_left(Text *text, short sel)
00958 {
00959     TextLine **linep, *oldl;
00960     int *charp, oldc, oldflags, i;
00961     unsigned char oldu;
00962     int pos;
00963 
00964     if (!text) return;
00965     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
00966     else { txt_pop_first(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
00967     if (!*linep) return;
00968 
00969     oldflags = text->flags;
00970     text->flags &= ~TXT_TABSTOSPACES;
00971 
00972     oldl= *linep;
00973     oldc= *charp;
00974     oldu= undoing;
00975     undoing= 1; /* Don't push individual moves to undo stack */
00976 
00977     pos = *charp;
00978     BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8((*linep)->line, (*linep)->len,
00979                              &pos, STRCUR_DIR_PREV,
00980                              STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
00981     for (i = *charp; i > pos; i--) {
00982         txt_move_left(text, sel);
00983     }
00984 
00985     text->flags = oldflags;
00986 
00987     undoing= oldu;
00988     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, oldl), oldc, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
00989 }
00990 
00991 void txt_jump_right(Text *text, short sel)
00992 {
00993     TextLine **linep, *oldl;
00994     int *charp, oldc, oldflags, i;
00995     unsigned char oldu;
00996     int pos;
00997 
00998     if (!text) return;
00999     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01000     else { txt_pop_last(text); txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp); }
01001     if (!*linep) return;
01002 
01003     oldflags = text->flags;
01004     text->flags &= ~TXT_TABSTOSPACES;
01005 
01006     oldl= *linep;
01007     oldc= *charp;
01008     oldu= undoing;
01009     undoing= 1; /* Don't push individual moves to undo stack */
01010 
01011     pos = *charp;
01012     BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8((*linep)->line, (*linep)->len,
01013                              &pos, STRCUR_DIR_NEXT,
01014                              STRCUR_JUMP_DELIM);
01015     for (i = *charp; i < pos; i++) {
01016         txt_move_right(text, sel);
01017     }
01018 
01019     text->flags = oldflags;
01020 
01021     undoing= oldu;
01022     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, oldl), oldc, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
01023 }
01024 
01025 void txt_move_bol (Text *text, short sel) 
01026 {
01027     TextLine **linep;
01028     int *charp, old;
01029     
01030     if (!text) return;
01031     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01032     else txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp);
01033     if (!*linep) return;
01034     old= *charp;
01035     
01036     *charp= 0;
01037 
01038     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01039     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), old, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
01040 }
01041 
01042 void txt_move_eol (Text *text, short sel) 
01043 {
01044     TextLine **linep;
01045     int *charp, old;
01046     
01047     if (!text) return;
01048     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01049     else txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp);
01050     if (!*linep) return;
01051     old= *charp;
01052         
01053     *charp= (*linep)->len;
01054 
01055     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01056     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), old, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
01057 }
01058 
01059 void txt_move_bof (Text *text, short sel)
01060 {
01061     TextLine **linep;
01062     int *charp, old;
01063     
01064     if (!text) return;
01065     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01066     else txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp);
01067     if (!*linep) return;
01068     old= *charp;
01069 
01070     *linep= text->lines.first;
01071     *charp= 0;
01072 
01073     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01074     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), old, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
01075 }
01076 
01077 void txt_move_eof (Text *text, short sel)
01078 {
01079     TextLine **linep;
01080     int *charp, old;
01081     
01082     if (!text) return;
01083     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01084     else txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp);
01085     if (!*linep) return;
01086     old= *charp;
01087 
01088     *linep= text->lines.last;
01089     *charp= (*linep)->len;
01090 
01091     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01092     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), old, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);    
01093 }
01094 
01095 void txt_move_toline (Text *text, unsigned int line, short sel)
01096 {
01097     txt_move_to(text, line, 0, sel);
01098 }
01099 
01100 /* Moves to a certain byte in a line, not a certain utf8-character! */
01101 void txt_move_to (Text *text, unsigned int line, unsigned int ch, short sel)
01102 {
01103     TextLine **linep, *oldl;
01104     int *charp, oldc;
01105     unsigned int i;
01106     
01107     if (!text) return;
01108     if (sel) txt_curs_sel(text, &linep, &charp);
01109     else txt_curs_cur(text, &linep, &charp);
01110     if (!*linep) return;
01111     oldc= *charp;
01112     oldl= *linep;
01113     
01114     *linep= text->lines.first;
01115     for (i=0; i<line; i++) {
01116         if ((*linep)->next) *linep= (*linep)->next;
01117         else break;
01118     }
01119     if (ch>(unsigned int)((*linep)->len))
01120         ch= (unsigned int)((*linep)->len);
01121     *charp= ch;
01122     
01123     if (!sel) txt_pop_sel(text);
01124     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, sel?UNDO_STO:UNDO_CTO, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, oldl), oldc, txt_get_span(text->lines.first, *linep), (unsigned short)*charp);
01125 }
01126 
01127 /****************************/
01128 /* Text selection functions */
01129 /****************************/
01130 
01131 static void txt_curs_swap (Text *text)
01132 {
01133     TextLine *tmpl;
01134     int tmpc;
01135         
01136     tmpl= text->curl;
01137     text->curl= text->sell;
01138     text->sell= tmpl;
01139     
01140     tmpc= text->curc;
01141     text->curc= text->selc;
01142     text->selc= tmpc;
01143     
01144     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_op(text, UNDO_SWAP);
01145 }
01146 
01147 static void txt_pop_first (Text *text)
01148 {
01149             
01150     if (txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell)<0 ||
01151         (text->curl==text->sell && text->curc>text->selc)) {    
01152         txt_curs_swap(text);
01153     }
01154 
01155     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, UNDO_STO,
01156         txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell), 
01157         text->selc, 
01158         txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl), 
01159         text->curc);        
01160     
01161     txt_pop_sel(text);
01162 }
01163 
01164 static void txt_pop_last (Text *text)
01165 {
01166     if (txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell)>0 ||
01167         (text->curl==text->sell && text->curc<text->selc)) {
01168         txt_curs_swap(text);
01169     }
01170 
01171     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_toop(text, UNDO_STO,
01172         txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->sell), 
01173         text->selc, 
01174         txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl), 
01175         text->curc);        
01176     
01177     txt_pop_sel(text);
01178 }
01179 
01180 /* never used: CVS 1.19 */
01181 /*  static void txt_pop_selr (Text *text) */
01182 
01183 void txt_pop_sel (Text *text)
01184 {
01185     text->sell= text->curl;
01186     text->selc= text->curc; 
01187 }
01188 
01189 void txt_order_cursors(Text *text)
01190 {
01191     if (!text) return;
01192     if (!text->curl) return;
01193     if (!text->sell) return;
01194     
01195         /* Flip so text->curl is before text->sell */
01196     if (txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell)<0 ||
01197             (text->curl==text->sell && text->curc>text->selc))
01198         txt_curs_swap(text);
01199 }
01200 
01201 int txt_has_sel(Text *text)
01202 {
01203     return ((text->curl!=text->sell) || (text->curc!=text->selc));
01204 }
01205 
01206 static void txt_delete_sel (Text *text)
01207 {
01208     TextLine *tmpl;
01209     TextMarker *mrk;
01210     char *buf;
01211     int move, lineno;
01212     
01213     if (!text) return;
01214     if (!text->curl) return;
01215     if (!text->sell) return;
01216 
01217     if (!txt_has_sel(text)) return;
01218     
01219     txt_order_cursors(text);
01220 
01221     if (!undoing) {
01222         buf= txt_sel_to_buf(text);
01223         txt_undo_add_block(text, UNDO_DBLOCK, buf);
01224         MEM_freeN(buf);
01225     }
01226 
01227     buf= MEM_mallocN(text->curc+(text->sell->len - text->selc)+1, "textline_string");
01228     
01229     if (text->curl != text->sell) {
01230         txt_clear_marker_region(text, text->curl, text->curc, text->curl->len, 0, 0);
01231         move= txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell);
01232     }
01233     else {
01234         mrk= txt_find_marker_region(text, text->curl, text->curc, text->selc, 0, 0);
01235         if (mrk && (mrk->start > text->curc || mrk->end < text->selc))
01236             txt_clear_marker_region(text, text->curl, text->curc, text->selc, 0, 0);
01237         move= 0;
01238     }
01239 
01240     mrk= txt_find_marker_region(text, text->sell, text->selc-1, text->sell->len, 0, 0);
01241     if (mrk) {
01242         lineno= mrk->lineno;
01243         do {
01244             mrk->lineno -= move;
01245             if (mrk->start > text->curc) mrk->start -= text->selc - text->curc;
01246             mrk->end -= text->selc - text->curc;
01247             mrk= mrk->next;
01248         } while (mrk && mrk->lineno==lineno);
01249     }
01250 
01251     strncpy(buf, text->curl->line, text->curc);
01252     strcpy(buf+text->curc, text->sell->line + text->selc);
01253     buf[text->curc+(text->sell->len - text->selc)]=0;
01254 
01255     make_new_line(text->curl, buf);
01256     
01257     tmpl= text->sell;
01258     while (tmpl != text->curl) {
01259         tmpl= tmpl->prev;
01260         if (!tmpl) break;
01261         
01262         txt_delete_line(text, tmpl->next);
01263     }
01264     
01265     text->sell= text->curl;
01266     text->selc= text->curc;
01267 }
01268 
01269 void txt_sel_all (Text *text)
01270 {
01271     if (!text) return;
01272 
01273     text->curl= text->lines.first;
01274     text->curc= 0;
01275     
01276     text->sell= text->lines.last;
01277     text->selc= text->sell->len;
01278 }
01279 
01280 void txt_sel_line (Text *text)
01281 {
01282     if (!text) return;
01283     if (!text->curl) return;
01284     
01285     text->curc= 0;
01286     text->sell= text->curl;
01287     text->selc= text->sell->len;
01288 }
01289 
01290 /***************************/
01291 /* Cut and paste functions */
01292 /***************************/
01293 
01294 char *txt_to_buf (Text *text)
01295 {
01296     int length;
01297     TextLine *tmp, *linef, *linel;
01298     int charf, charl;
01299     char *buf;
01300     
01301     if (!text) return NULL;
01302     if (!text->curl) return NULL;
01303     if (!text->sell) return NULL;
01304     if (!text->lines.first) return NULL;
01305 
01306     linef= text->lines.first;
01307     charf= 0;
01308         
01309     linel= text->lines.last;
01310     charl= linel->len;
01311 
01312     if (linef == text->lines.last) {
01313         length= charl-charf;
01314 
01315         buf= MEM_mallocN(length+2, "text buffer");
01316         
01317         BLI_strncpy(buf, linef->line + charf, length+1);
01318         buf[length]=0;
01319     }
01320     else {
01321         length= linef->len - charf;
01322         length+= charl;
01323         length+= 2; /* For the 2 '\n' */
01324         
01325         tmp= linef->next;
01326         while (tmp && tmp!= linel) {
01327             length+= tmp->len+1;
01328             tmp= tmp->next;
01329         }
01330         
01331         buf= MEM_mallocN(length+1, "cut buffer");
01332 
01333         strncpy(buf, linef->line + charf, linef->len-charf);
01334         length= linef->len - charf;
01335         
01336         buf[length++]='\n';
01337         
01338         tmp= linef->next;
01339         while (tmp && tmp!=linel) {
01340             strncpy(buf+length, tmp->line, tmp->len);
01341             length+= tmp->len;
01342             
01343             buf[length++]='\n';         
01344             
01345             tmp= tmp->next;
01346         }
01347         strncpy(buf+length, linel->line, charl);
01348         length+= charl;
01349         
01350         /* python compiler wants an empty end line */
01351         buf[length++]='\n';         
01352         buf[length]=0;
01353     }
01354     
01355     return buf;
01356 }
01357 
01358 int txt_find_string(Text *text, const char *findstr, int wrap, int match_case)
01359 {
01360     TextLine *tl, *startl;
01361     char *s= NULL;
01362 
01363     if (!text || !text->curl || !text->sell) return 0;
01364     
01365     txt_order_cursors(text);
01366 
01367     tl= startl= text->sell;
01368     
01369     if (match_case) s= strstr(&tl->line[text->selc], findstr);
01370     else s= BLI_strcasestr(&tl->line[text->selc], findstr);
01371     while (!s) {
01372         tl= tl->next;
01373         if (!tl) {
01374             if (wrap)
01375                 tl= text->lines.first;
01376             else
01377                 break;
01378         }
01379 
01380         if (match_case) s= strstr(tl->line, findstr);
01381         else s= BLI_strcasestr(tl->line, findstr);
01382         if (tl==startl)
01383             break;
01384     }
01385     
01386     if (s) {
01387         int newl= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, tl);
01388         int newc= (int)(s-tl->line);
01389         txt_move_to(text, newl, newc, 0);
01390         txt_move_to(text, newl, newc + strlen(findstr), 1);
01391         return 1;               
01392     }
01393     else
01394         return 0;
01395 }
01396 
01397 char *txt_sel_to_buf (Text *text)
01398 {
01399     char *buf;
01400     int length=0;
01401     TextLine *tmp, *linef, *linel;
01402     int charf, charl;
01403     
01404     if (!text) return NULL;
01405     if (!text->curl) return NULL;
01406     if (!text->sell) return NULL;
01407     
01408     if (text->curl==text->sell) {
01409         linef= linel= text->curl;
01410         
01411         if (text->curc < text->selc) {
01412             charf= text->curc;
01413             charl= text->selc;
01414         }
01415         else {
01416             charf= text->selc;
01417             charl= text->curc;
01418         }
01419     }
01420     else if (txt_get_span(text->curl, text->sell)<0) {
01421         linef= text->sell;
01422         linel= text->curl;
01423 
01424         charf= text->selc;      
01425         charl= text->curc;
01426     }
01427     else {
01428         linef= text->curl;
01429         linel= text->sell;
01430         
01431         charf= text->curc;
01432         charl= text->selc;
01433     }
01434 
01435     if (linef == linel) {
01436         length= charl-charf;
01437 
01438         buf= MEM_mallocN(length+1, "sel buffer");
01439         
01440         BLI_strncpy(buf, linef->line + charf, length+1);
01441     }
01442     else {
01443         length+= linef->len - charf;
01444         length+= charl;
01445         length++; /* For the '\n' */
01446         
01447         tmp= linef->next;
01448         while (tmp && tmp!= linel) {
01449             length+= tmp->len+1;
01450             tmp= tmp->next;
01451         }
01452         
01453         buf= MEM_mallocN(length+1, "sel buffer");
01454         
01455         strncpy(buf, linef->line+ charf, linef->len-charf);
01456         length= linef->len-charf;
01457         
01458         buf[length++]='\n';
01459         
01460         tmp= linef->next;
01461         while (tmp && tmp!=linel) {
01462             strncpy(buf+length, tmp->line, tmp->len);
01463             length+= tmp->len;
01464             
01465             buf[length++]='\n';         
01466             
01467             tmp= tmp->next;
01468         }
01469         strncpy(buf+length, linel->line, charl);
01470         length+= charl;
01471         
01472         buf[length]=0;
01473     }   
01474 
01475     return buf;
01476 }
01477 
01478 static void txt_shift_markers(Text *text, int lineno, int count)
01479 {
01480     TextMarker *marker;
01481 
01482     for (marker=text->markers.first; marker; marker= marker->next)
01483         if (marker->lineno>=lineno) {
01484             marker->lineno+= count;
01485         }
01486 }
01487 
01488 void txt_insert_buf(Text *text, const char *in_buffer)
01489 {
01490     int l=0, u, len, lineno= -1, count= 0;
01491     size_t i=0, j;
01492     TextLine *add;
01493     char *buffer;
01494 
01495     if (!text) return;
01496     if (!in_buffer) return;
01497 
01498     txt_delete_sel(text);
01499     
01500     len= strlen(in_buffer);
01501     buffer= BLI_strdupn(in_buffer, len);
01502     len+= txt_extended_ascii_as_utf8(&buffer);
01503     
01504     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_block(text, UNDO_IBLOCK, buffer);
01505 
01506     u= undoing;
01507     undoing= 1;
01508 
01509     /* Read the first line (or as close as possible */
01510     while (buffer[i] && buffer[i]!='\n')
01511         txt_add_raw_char(text, BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode_step(buffer, &i));
01512     
01513     if (buffer[i]=='\n') txt_split_curline(text);
01514     else { undoing = u; MEM_freeN(buffer); return; }
01515     i++;
01516 
01517     /* Read as many full lines as we can */
01518     lineno= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl);
01519 
01520     while (i<len) {
01521         l=0;
01522 
01523         while (buffer[i] && buffer[i]!='\n') {
01524             i++; l++;
01525         }
01526     
01527         if (buffer[i]=='\n') {
01528             add= txt_new_linen(buffer +(i-l), l);
01529             BLI_insertlinkbefore(&text->lines, text->curl, add);
01530             i++;
01531             count++;
01532         }
01533         else {
01534             if (count) {
01535                 txt_shift_markers(text, lineno, count);
01536                 count= 0;
01537             }
01538 
01539             for (j= i-l; j<i && j<len; )
01540                 txt_add_raw_char(text, BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode_step(buffer, &j));
01541             break;
01542         }
01543     }
01544     
01545     MEM_freeN(buffer);
01546 
01547     if (count) {
01548         txt_shift_markers(text, lineno, count);
01549     }
01550 
01551     undoing= u;
01552 }
01553 
01554 /******************/
01555 /* Undo functions */
01556 /******************/
01557 
01558 static int max_undo_test(Text *text, int x)
01559 {
01560     while (text->undo_pos+x >= text->undo_len) {
01561         if (text->undo_len*2 > TXT_MAX_UNDO) {
01562             /* XXX error("Undo limit reached, buffer cleared\n"); */
01563             MEM_freeN(text->undo_buf);
01564             init_undo_text(text);
01565             return 0;
01566         }
01567         else {
01568             void *tmp= text->undo_buf;
01569             text->undo_buf= MEM_callocN(text->undo_len*2, "undo buf");
01570             memcpy(text->undo_buf, tmp, text->undo_len);
01571             text->undo_len*=2;
01572             MEM_freeN(tmp);
01573         }
01574     }
01575 
01576     return 1;
01577 }
01578 
01579 static void dump_buffer(Text *text) 
01580 {
01581     int i= 0;
01582     
01583     while (i++<text->undo_pos) printf("%d: %d %c\n", i, text->undo_buf[i], text->undo_buf[i]);
01584 }
01585 
01586 void txt_print_undo(Text *text)
01587 {
01588     int i= 0;
01589     int op;
01590     const char *ops;
01591     int linep, charp;
01592     
01593     dump_buffer(text);
01594     
01595     printf ("---< Undo Buffer >---\n");
01596     
01597     printf ("UndoPosition is %d\n", text->undo_pos);
01598     
01599     while (i<=text->undo_pos) {
01600         op= text->undo_buf[i];
01601         
01602         if (op==UNDO_CLEFT) {
01603             ops= "Cursor left";
01604         }
01605         else if (op==UNDO_CRIGHT) {
01606             ops= "Cursor right";
01607         }
01608         else if (op==UNDO_CUP) {
01609             ops= "Cursor up";
01610         }
01611         else if (op==UNDO_CDOWN) {
01612             ops= "Cursor down";
01613         }
01614         else if (op==UNDO_SLEFT) {
01615             ops= "Selection left";
01616         }
01617         else if (op==UNDO_SRIGHT) {
01618             ops= "Selection right";
01619         }
01620         else if (op==UNDO_SUP) {
01621             ops= "Selection up";
01622         }
01623         else if (op==UNDO_SDOWN) {
01624             ops= "Selection down";
01625         }
01626         else if (op==UNDO_STO) {
01627             ops= "Selection ";
01628         }
01629         else if (op==UNDO_CTO) {
01630             ops= "Cursor ";
01631         }
01632         else if (op==UNDO_INSERT_1) {
01633             ops= "Insert ascii ";
01634         }
01635         else if (op==UNDO_INSERT_2) {
01636             ops= "Insert 2 bytes ";
01637         }
01638         else if (op==UNDO_INSERT_3) {
01639             ops= "Insert 3 bytes ";
01640         }
01641         else if (op==UNDO_INSERT_4) {
01642             ops= "Insert unicode ";
01643         }
01644         else if (op==UNDO_BS_1) {
01645             ops= "Backspace for ascii ";
01646         }
01647         else if (op==UNDO_BS_2) {
01648             ops= "Backspace for 2 bytes ";
01649         }
01650         else if (op==UNDO_BS_3) {
01651             ops= "Backspace for 3 bytes ";
01652         }
01653         else if (op==UNDO_BS_4) {
01654             ops= "Backspace for unicode ";
01655         }
01656         else if (op==UNDO_DEL_1) {
01657             ops= "Delete ascii ";
01658         }
01659         else if (op==UNDO_DEL_2) {
01660             ops= "Delete 2 bytes ";
01661         }
01662         else if (op==UNDO_DEL_3) {
01663             ops= "Delete 3 bytes ";
01664         }
01665         else if (op==UNDO_DEL_4) {
01666             ops= "Delete unicode ";
01667         }
01668         else if (op==UNDO_SWAP) {
01669             ops= "Cursor swap";
01670         }
01671         else if (op==UNDO_DBLOCK) {
01672             ops= "Delete text block";
01673         }
01674         else if (op==UNDO_IBLOCK) {
01675             ops= "Insert text block";
01676         }
01677         else if (op==UNDO_INDENT) {
01678             ops= "Indent ";
01679         }
01680         else if (op==UNDO_UNINDENT) {
01681             ops= "Unindent ";
01682         }
01683         else if (op==UNDO_COMMENT) {
01684             ops= "Comment ";
01685         }
01686         else if (op==UNDO_UNCOMMENT) {
01687             ops= "Uncomment ";
01688         }
01689         else {
01690             ops= "Unknown";
01691         }
01692         
01693         printf ("Op (%o) at %d = %s", op, i, ops);
01694         if (op >= UNDO_INSERT_1 && op <= UNDO_DEL_4) {
01695             i++;
01696             printf (" - Char is ");
01697             switch (op) {
01698                 case UNDO_INSERT_1: case UNDO_BS_1: case UNDO_DEL_1:
01699                     printf ("%c", text->undo_buf[i]);  
01700                     i++;
01701                     break;
01702                 case UNDO_INSERT_2: case UNDO_BS_2: case UNDO_DEL_2:
01703                     printf ("%c%c", text->undo_buf[i], text->undo_buf[i+1]);  
01704                     i+=2;
01705                     break;
01706                 case UNDO_INSERT_3: case UNDO_BS_3: case UNDO_DEL_3:
01707                     printf ("%c%c%c", text->undo_buf[i], text->undo_buf[i+1], text->undo_buf[i+2]);  
01708                     i+=3;
01709                     break;
01710                 case UNDO_INSERT_4: case UNDO_BS_4: case UNDO_DEL_4: {
01711                     unsigned int uc;
01712                     char c[BLI_UTF8_MAX+1];
01713                     size_t c_len;
01714                     uc= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01715                     uc= uc+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01716                     uc= uc+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01717                     uc= uc+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01718                     c_len= BLI_str_utf8_from_unicode(uc, c);
01719                     c[c_len]= '\0';
01720                     puts(c);
01721                 }
01722             }
01723         }
01724         else if (op==UNDO_STO || op==UNDO_CTO) {
01725             i++;
01726 
01727             charp= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01728             charp= charp+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01729 
01730             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01731             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01732             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01733             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01734             
01735             printf ("to <%d, %d> ", linep, charp);
01736 
01737             charp= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01738             charp= charp+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01739 
01740             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01741             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01742             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01743             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01744             
01745             printf ("from <%d, %d>", linep, charp);
01746         }
01747         else if (op==UNDO_DBLOCK || op==UNDO_IBLOCK) {
01748             i++;
01749 
01750             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01751             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01752             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01753             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01754             
01755             printf (" (length %d) <", linep);
01756             
01757             while (linep>0) {
01758                 putchar(text->undo_buf[i]);
01759                 linep--; i++;
01760             }
01761             
01762             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01763             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01764             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01765             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01766             printf ("> (%d)", linep);
01767         }
01768         else if (op==UNDO_INDENT || op==UNDO_UNINDENT) {
01769             i++;
01770 
01771             charp= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01772             charp= charp+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01773 
01774             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01775             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01776             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01777             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01778             
01779             printf ("to <%d, %d> ", linep, charp);
01780 
01781             charp= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01782             charp= charp+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01783 
01784             linep= text->undo_buf[i]; i++;
01785             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<8); i++;
01786             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<16); i++;
01787             linep= linep+(text->undo_buf[i]<<24); i++;
01788             
01789             printf ("from <%d, %d>", linep, charp);
01790         }
01791         
01792         printf (" %d\n",  i);
01793         i++;
01794     }
01795 }
01796 
01797 static void txt_undo_add_op(Text *text, int op)
01798 {
01799     if (!max_undo_test(text, 2))
01800         return;
01801     
01802     text->undo_pos++;
01803     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op;
01804     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos+1]= 0;
01805 }
01806 
01807 static void txt_undo_store_uint16(char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos, unsigned short value) 
01808 {
01809     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value)&0xff;
01810     (*undo_pos)++;
01811     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value>>8)&0xff;
01812     (*undo_pos)++;
01813 }
01814 
01815 static void txt_undo_store_uint32(char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos, unsigned int value) 
01816 {
01817     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value)&0xff;
01818     (*undo_pos)++;
01819     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value>>8)&0xff;
01820     (*undo_pos)++;
01821     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value>>16)&0xff;
01822     (*undo_pos)++;
01823     undo_buf[*undo_pos]= (value>>24)&0xff;
01824     (*undo_pos)++;
01825 }
01826 
01827 static void txt_undo_add_block(Text *text, int op, const char *buf)
01828 {
01829     unsigned int length= strlen(buf);
01830     
01831     if (!max_undo_test(text, length+11))
01832         return;
01833 
01834     text->undo_pos++;
01835     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op;
01836     text->undo_pos++;
01837     
01838     txt_undo_store_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, length);
01839     
01840     strncpy(text->undo_buf+text->undo_pos, buf, length);
01841     text->undo_pos+=length;
01842 
01843     txt_undo_store_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, length);
01844     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op;
01845     
01846     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos+1]= 0;
01847 }
01848 
01849 void txt_undo_add_toop(Text *text, int op, unsigned int froml, unsigned short fromc, unsigned int tol, unsigned short toc)
01850 {
01851     if (!max_undo_test(text, 15))
01852         return;
01853 
01854     if (froml==tol && fromc==toc) return;
01855 
01856     text->undo_pos++;
01857     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op;
01858 
01859     text->undo_pos++;
01860     
01861     txt_undo_store_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, fromc);
01862     txt_undo_store_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, froml);
01863     txt_undo_store_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, toc);
01864     txt_undo_store_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, tol);
01865         
01866     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op;
01867 
01868     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos+1]= 0;
01869 }
01870 
01871 static void txt_undo_add_charop(Text *text, int op_start, unsigned int c)
01872 {
01873     char utf8[BLI_UTF8_MAX];
01874     size_t i, utf8_size = BLI_str_utf8_from_unicode(c, utf8);
01875     
01876     if (!max_undo_test(text, 3 + utf8_size))
01877         return;
01878     
01879     text->undo_pos++;
01880     
01881     if (utf8_size < 4) {
01882         text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op_start + utf8_size - 1;
01883         text->undo_pos++;
01884         
01885         for (i = 0; i < utf8_size; i++) {
01886             text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= utf8[i];
01887             text->undo_pos++;
01888         }
01889         
01890         text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op_start + utf8_size - 1;
01891     }
01892     else {
01893         text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op_start + 3;
01894         text->undo_pos++;
01895         txt_undo_store_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, c);
01896         text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]= op_start + 3;
01897     }
01898     
01899     text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos+1]= 0;
01900 }
01901 
01902 static unsigned short txt_undo_read_uint16(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos)
01903 {
01904     unsigned short val;
01905     val= undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01906     val= (val<<8)+undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01907     return val;
01908 }
01909 
01910 static unsigned int txt_undo_read_uint32(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos)
01911 {
01912     unsigned int val;
01913     val= undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01914     val= (val<<8)+undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01915     val= (val<<8)+undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01916     val= (val<<8)+undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01917     return val;
01918 }
01919 
01920 static unsigned int txt_undo_read_unicode(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos, short bytes)
01921 {
01922     unsigned int unicode;
01923     char utf8[BLI_UTF8_MAX+1];
01924     
01925     switch (bytes) {
01926         case 1: /* ascii */
01927             unicode = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--; 
01928             break;
01929         case 2: /* 2-byte symbol */
01930             utf8[2] = '\0';
01931             utf8[1] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01932             utf8[0] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01933             unicode= BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode(utf8);
01934             break;
01935         case 3: /* 3-byte symbol */
01936             utf8[3] = '\0';
01937             utf8[2] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01938             utf8[1] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01939             utf8[0] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)--;
01940             unicode= BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode(utf8);
01941             break;
01942         case 4: /* 32-bit unicode symbol */
01943             unicode= txt_undo_read_uint32(undo_buf, undo_pos);
01944         default:
01945             /* should never happen */
01946             BLI_assert(0);
01947             unicode= 0;
01948     }
01949     
01950     return unicode;
01951 }
01952 
01953 static unsigned short txt_redo_read_uint16(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos)
01954 {
01955     unsigned short val;
01956     val = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01957     val = val+(undo_buf[*undo_pos]<<8); (*undo_pos)++;
01958     return val;
01959 }
01960 
01961 static unsigned int txt_redo_read_uint32(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos)
01962 {
01963     unsigned int val;
01964     val= undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01965     val= val+(undo_buf[*undo_pos]<<8); (*undo_pos)++;
01966     val= val+(undo_buf[*undo_pos]<<16); (*undo_pos)++;
01967     val= val+(undo_buf[*undo_pos]<<24); (*undo_pos)++;
01968     return val;
01969 }
01970 
01971 static unsigned int txt_redo_read_unicode(const char *undo_buf, int *undo_pos, short bytes)
01972 {
01973     unsigned int unicode;
01974     char utf8[BLI_UTF8_MAX+1];
01975     
01976     switch (bytes) {
01977         case 1: /* ascii */
01978             unicode = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++; 
01979             break;
01980         case 2: /* 2-byte symbol */
01981             utf8[0] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01982             utf8[1] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01983             utf8[2] = '\0';
01984             unicode= BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode(utf8);
01985             break;
01986         case 3: /* 3-byte symbol */
01987             utf8[0] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01988             utf8[1] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01989             utf8[2] = undo_buf[*undo_pos]; (*undo_pos)++;
01990             utf8[3] = '\0';
01991             unicode= BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode(utf8);
01992             break;
01993         case 4: /* 32-bit unicode symbol */
01994             unicode= txt_undo_read_uint32(undo_buf, undo_pos);
01995         default:
01996             /* should never happen */
01997             BLI_assert(0);
01998             unicode= 0;
01999     }
02000     
02001     return unicode;
02002 }
02003 
02004 void txt_do_undo(Text *text)
02005 {
02006     int op= text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos];
02007     unsigned int linep, i;
02008     unsigned short charp;
02009     TextLine *holdl;
02010     int holdc, holdln;
02011     char *buf;
02012     
02013     if (text->undo_pos<0) {
02014         return;
02015     }
02016 
02017     text->undo_pos--;
02018 
02019     undoing= 1;
02020     
02021     switch(op) {
02022         case UNDO_CLEFT:
02023             txt_move_right(text, 0);
02024             break;
02025             
02026         case UNDO_CRIGHT:
02027             txt_move_left(text, 0);
02028             break;
02029             
02030         case UNDO_CUP:
02031             txt_move_down(text, 0);
02032             break;
02033             
02034         case UNDO_CDOWN:
02035             txt_move_up(text, 0);
02036             break;
02037 
02038         case UNDO_SLEFT:
02039             txt_move_right(text, 1);
02040             break;
02041 
02042         case UNDO_SRIGHT:
02043             txt_move_left(text, 1);
02044             break;
02045 
02046         case UNDO_SUP:
02047             txt_move_down(text, 1);
02048             break;
02049 
02050         case UNDO_SDOWN:
02051             txt_move_up(text, 1);
02052             break;
02053         
02054         case UNDO_CTO:
02055         case UNDO_STO:
02056             text->undo_pos--;
02057             text->undo_pos--;
02058             text->undo_pos--;
02059             text->undo_pos--;
02060         
02061             text->undo_pos--;
02062             text->undo_pos--;
02063         
02064             linep= txt_undo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02065             charp= txt_undo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02066             
02067             if (op==UNDO_CTO) {
02068                 txt_move_toline(text, linep, 0);
02069                 text->curc= charp;
02070                 txt_pop_sel(text);
02071             }
02072             else {
02073                 txt_move_toline(text, linep, 1);
02074                 text->selc= charp;
02075             }
02076             
02077             text->undo_pos--;
02078             break;
02079             
02080         case UNDO_INSERT_1: case UNDO_INSERT_2: case UNDO_INSERT_3: case UNDO_INSERT_4:
02081             txt_backspace_char(text);
02082             text->undo_pos-= op - UNDO_INSERT_1 + 1;
02083             text->undo_pos--;
02084             break;
02085 
02086         case UNDO_BS_1: case UNDO_BS_2: case UNDO_BS_3: case UNDO_BS_4:
02087             charp = op - UNDO_BS_1 + 1;
02088             txt_add_char(text, txt_undo_read_unicode(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, charp));
02089             text->undo_pos--;
02090             break;      
02091             
02092         case UNDO_DEL_1: case UNDO_DEL_2: case UNDO_DEL_3: case UNDO_DEL_4: 
02093             charp = op - UNDO_DEL_1 + 1;
02094             txt_add_char(text, txt_undo_read_unicode(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, charp));
02095             txt_move_left(text, 0);
02096             text->undo_pos--;
02097             break;
02098 
02099         case UNDO_SWAP:
02100             txt_curs_swap(text);
02101             break;
02102 
02103         case UNDO_DBLOCK:
02104             linep= txt_undo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02105 
02106             buf= MEM_mallocN(linep+1, "dblock buffer");
02107             for (i=0; i < linep; i++) {
02108                 buf[(linep-1)-i]= text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]; 
02109                 text->undo_pos--;
02110             }
02111             buf[i]= 0;
02112             
02113             txt_curs_first(text, &holdl, &holdc);
02114             holdln= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, holdl);
02115             
02116             txt_insert_buf(text, buf);          
02117             MEM_freeN(buf);
02118 
02119             text->curl= text->lines.first;
02120             while (holdln>0) {
02121                 if (text->curl->next)
02122                     text->curl= text->curl->next;
02123                     
02124                 holdln--;
02125             }
02126             text->curc= holdc;
02127 
02128             text->undo_pos--;
02129             text->undo_pos--;
02130             text->undo_pos--; 
02131             text->undo_pos--;
02132 
02133             text->undo_pos--;
02134             
02135             break;
02136 
02137         case UNDO_IBLOCK:
02138             linep= txt_undo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02139             txt_delete_sel(text);
02140 
02141             /* txt_backspace_char removes utf8-characters, not bytes */
02142             buf= MEM_mallocN(linep+1, "iblock buffer");
02143             for (i=0; i < linep; i++) {
02144                 buf[(linep-1)-i]= text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]; 
02145                 text->undo_pos--;
02146             }
02147             buf[i]= 0;
02148             linep= txt_utf8_len(buf);
02149             MEM_freeN(buf);
02150 
02151             while (linep>0) {
02152                 txt_backspace_char(text);
02153                 linep--;
02154             }
02155 
02156             text->undo_pos--;
02157             text->undo_pos--;
02158             text->undo_pos--; 
02159             text->undo_pos--;
02160             
02161             text->undo_pos--;
02162 
02163             break;
02164         case UNDO_INDENT:
02165         case UNDO_UNINDENT:
02166         case UNDO_COMMENT:
02167         case UNDO_UNCOMMENT:
02168             linep= txt_undo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02169             //linep is now the end line of the selection
02170             
02171             charp = txt_undo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02172             //charp is the last char selected or text->line->len
02173             
02174             //set the selection for this now
02175             text->selc = charp;
02176             text->sell = text->lines.first;
02177             for (i= 0; i < linep; i++) {
02178                 text->sell = text->sell->next;
02179             }
02180 
02181             linep= txt_undo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02182             //first line to be selected
02183             
02184             charp = txt_undo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02185             //first postion to be selected
02186             text->curc = charp;
02187             text->curl = text->lines.first;
02188             for (i = 0; i < linep; i++) {
02189                 text->curl = text->curl->next;
02190             }
02191 
02192             
02193             if (op==UNDO_INDENT) {
02194                 txt_unindent(text);
02195             }
02196             else if (op== UNDO_UNINDENT) {
02197                 txt_indent(text);
02198             }
02199             else if (op == UNDO_COMMENT) {
02200                 txt_uncomment(text);
02201             }
02202             else if (op == UNDO_UNCOMMENT) {
02203                 txt_comment(text);
02204             }
02205 
02206             text->undo_pos--;
02207             break;
02208         default:
02209             //XXX error("Undo buffer error - resetting");
02210             text->undo_pos= -1;
02211             
02212             break;
02213     }
02214 
02215     /* next undo step may need evaluating */
02216     if (text->undo_pos>=0) {
02217         switch (text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos]) {
02218             case UNDO_STO:
02219                 txt_do_undo(text);
02220                 txt_do_redo(text); /* selections need restoring */
02221                 break;
02222             case UNDO_SWAP:
02223                 txt_do_undo(text); /* swaps should appear transparent */
02224                 break;
02225         }
02226     }
02227     
02228     undoing= 0; 
02229 }
02230 
02231 void txt_do_redo(Text *text)
02232 {
02233     char op;
02234     unsigned int linep, i;
02235     unsigned short charp;
02236     char *buf;
02237     
02238     text->undo_pos++;   
02239     op= text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos];
02240     
02241     if (!op) {
02242         text->undo_pos--;
02243         return;
02244     }
02245     
02246     undoing= 1;
02247 
02248     switch(op) {
02249         case UNDO_CLEFT:
02250             txt_move_left(text, 0);
02251             break;
02252             
02253         case UNDO_CRIGHT:
02254             txt_move_right(text, 0);
02255             break;
02256             
02257         case UNDO_CUP:
02258             txt_move_up(text, 0);
02259             break;
02260             
02261         case UNDO_CDOWN:
02262             txt_move_down(text, 0);
02263             break;
02264 
02265         case UNDO_SLEFT:
02266             txt_move_left(text, 1);
02267             break;
02268 
02269         case UNDO_SRIGHT:
02270             txt_move_right(text, 1);
02271             break;
02272 
02273         case UNDO_SUP:
02274             txt_move_up(text, 1);
02275             break;
02276 
02277         case UNDO_SDOWN:
02278             txt_move_down(text, 1);
02279             break;
02280         
02281         case UNDO_INSERT_1: case UNDO_INSERT_2: case UNDO_INSERT_3: case UNDO_INSERT_4:
02282             text->undo_pos++;
02283             charp = op - UNDO_INSERT_1 + 1;
02284             txt_add_char(text, txt_redo_read_unicode(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos, charp));
02285             break;
02286 
02287         case UNDO_BS_1: case UNDO_BS_2: case UNDO_BS_3: case UNDO_BS_4:
02288             text->undo_pos++;
02289             txt_backspace_char(text);
02290             text->undo_pos+= op - UNDO_BS_1 + 1;
02291             break;
02292 
02293         case UNDO_DEL_1: case UNDO_DEL_2: case UNDO_DEL_3: case UNDO_DEL_4:
02294             text->undo_pos++;
02295             txt_delete_char(text);
02296             text->undo_pos+= op - UNDO_DEL_1 + 1;
02297             break;
02298 
02299         case UNDO_SWAP:
02300             txt_curs_swap(text);
02301             txt_do_redo(text); /* swaps should appear transparent a*/
02302             break;
02303             
02304         case UNDO_CTO:
02305         case UNDO_STO:
02306             text->undo_pos++;
02307             text->undo_pos++;
02308 
02309             text->undo_pos++;
02310             text->undo_pos++;
02311             text->undo_pos++;
02312             text->undo_pos++;
02313 
02314             text->undo_pos++;
02315 
02316             charp= txt_redo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02317             linep= txt_redo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02318             
02319             if (op==UNDO_CTO) {
02320                 txt_move_toline(text, linep, 0);
02321                 text->curc= charp;
02322                 txt_pop_sel(text);
02323             }
02324             else {
02325                 txt_move_toline(text, linep, 1);
02326                 text->selc= charp;
02327             }
02328 
02329             break;
02330 
02331         case UNDO_DBLOCK:
02332             text->undo_pos++;
02333             linep= txt_redo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02334             txt_delete_sel(text);
02335             
02336             text->undo_pos+=linep;
02337 
02338             text->undo_pos++;
02339             text->undo_pos++;
02340             text->undo_pos++; 
02341             text->undo_pos++;
02342             
02343             break;
02344 
02345         case UNDO_IBLOCK:
02346             text->undo_pos++;
02347             linep= txt_redo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02348 
02349             buf= MEM_mallocN(linep+1, "iblock buffer");
02350             memcpy (buf, &text->undo_buf[text->undo_pos], linep);
02351             text->undo_pos+= linep;
02352             buf[linep]= 0;
02353             
02354             txt_insert_buf(text, buf);          
02355             MEM_freeN(buf);
02356 
02357             text->undo_pos++;
02358             text->undo_pos++;
02359             text->undo_pos++; 
02360             text->undo_pos++;
02361             break;
02362             
02363         case UNDO_INDENT:
02364         case UNDO_UNINDENT:
02365         case UNDO_COMMENT:
02366         case UNDO_UNCOMMENT:
02367             text->undo_pos++;
02368             charp = txt_redo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02369             //charp is the first char selected or 0
02370             
02371             linep= txt_redo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02372             //linep is now the first line of the selection          
02373             //set the selcetion for this now
02374             text->curc = charp;
02375             text->curl = text->lines.first;
02376             for (i= 0; i < linep; i++) {
02377                 text->curl = text->curl->next;
02378             }
02379             
02380             charp = txt_redo_read_uint16(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02381             //last postion to be selected
02382             
02383             linep= txt_redo_read_uint32(text->undo_buf, &text->undo_pos);
02384             //Last line to be selected
02385             
02386             text->selc = charp;
02387             text->sell = text->lines.first;
02388             for (i = 0; i < linep; i++) {
02389                 text->sell = text->sell->next;
02390             }
02391 
02392             if (op==UNDO_INDENT) {
02393                 txt_indent(text);
02394             }
02395             else if (op== UNDO_UNINDENT) {
02396                 txt_unindent(text);
02397             }
02398             else if (op == UNDO_COMMENT) {
02399                 txt_comment(text);
02400             }
02401             else if (op == UNDO_UNCOMMENT) {
02402                 txt_uncomment(text);
02403             }
02404             break;
02405         default:
02406             //XXX error("Undo buffer error - resetting");
02407             text->undo_pos= -1;
02408 
02409             break;
02410     }
02411     
02412     undoing= 0; 
02413 }
02414 
02415 /**************************/
02416 /* Line editing functions */ 
02417 /**************************/
02418 
02419 void txt_split_curline (Text *text) 
02420 {
02421     TextLine *ins;
02422     TextMarker *mrk;
02423     char *left, *right;
02424     int lineno= -1;
02425     
02426     if (!text) return;
02427     if (!text->curl) return;
02428 
02429     txt_delete_sel(text);
02430 
02431     /* Move markers */
02432 
02433     lineno= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, text->curl);
02434     mrk= text->markers.first;
02435     while (mrk) {
02436         if (mrk->lineno==lineno && mrk->start>text->curc) {
02437             mrk->lineno++;
02438             mrk->start -= text->curc;
02439             mrk->end -= text->curc;
02440         }
02441         else if (mrk->lineno > lineno) {
02442             mrk->lineno++;
02443         }
02444         mrk= mrk->next;
02445     }
02446 
02447     /* Make the two half strings */
02448 
02449     left= MEM_mallocN(text->curc+1, "textline_string");
02450     if (text->curc) memcpy(left, text->curl->line, text->curc);
02451     left[text->curc]=0;
02452     
02453     right= MEM_mallocN(text->curl->len - text->curc+1, "textline_string");
02454     memcpy(right, text->curl->line+text->curc, text->curl->len-text->curc+1);
02455 
02456     MEM_freeN(text->curl->line);
02457     if (text->curl->format) MEM_freeN(text->curl->format);
02458 
02459     /* Make the new TextLine */
02460     
02461     ins= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(TextLine), "textline");
02462     ins->line= left;
02463     ins->format= NULL;
02464     ins->len= text->curc;
02465     
02466     text->curl->line= right;
02467     text->curl->format= NULL;
02468     text->curl->len= text->curl->len - text->curc;
02469     
02470     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&text->lines, text->curl, ins);    
02471     
02472     text->curc=0;
02473     
02474     txt_make_dirty(text);
02475     txt_clean_text(text);
02476     
02477     txt_pop_sel(text);
02478     if (!undoing) txt_undo_add_charop(text, UNDO_INSERT_1, '\n');
02479 }
02480 
02481 static void txt_delete_line (Text *text, TextLine *line) 
02482 {
02483     TextMarker *mrk=NULL, *nxt;
02484     int lineno= -1;
02485 
02486     if (!text) return;
02487     if (!text->curl) return;
02488 
02489     lineno= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, line);
02490     mrk= text->markers.first;
02491     while (mrk) {
02492         nxt= mrk->next;
02493         if (mrk->lineno==lineno)
02494             BLI_freelinkN(&text->markers, mrk);
02495         else if (mrk->lineno > lineno)
02496             mrk->lineno--;
02497         mrk= nxt;
02498     }
02499 
02500     BLI_remlink (&text->lines, line);
02501     
02502     if (line->line) MEM_freeN(line->line);
02503     if (line->format) MEM_freeN(line->format);
02504 
02505     MEM_freeN(line);
02506 
02507     txt_make_dirty(text);
02508     txt_clean_text(text);
02509 }
02510 
02511 static void txt_combine_lines (Text *text, TextLine *linea, TextLine *lineb)
02512 {
02513     char *tmp;
02514     TextMarker *mrk= NULL;
02515     int lineno=-1;
02516     
02517     if (!text) return;
02518     
02519     if (!linea || !lineb) return;
02520 
02521     mrk= txt_find_marker_region(text, lineb, 0, lineb->len, 0, 0);
02522     if (mrk) {
02523         lineno= mrk->lineno;
02524         do {
02525             mrk->lineno--;
02526             mrk->start += linea->len;
02527             mrk->end += linea->len;
02528             mrk= mrk->next;
02529         } while (mrk && mrk->lineno==lineno);
02530     }
02531     if (lineno==-1) lineno= txt_get_span(text->lines.first, lineb);
02532     
02533     tmp= MEM_mallocN(linea->len+lineb->len+1, "textline_string");
02534
